site.tagline: Services that bring you back to yourself.

hero.title: Back to You
hero.subtitle: Simple, calm, effective. Because your time is not a hobby.

about.title: About
about.bodyMd:
We focus on practical support and clarity.

- Clear steps
- Friendly process
- Results you can measure

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Click a card to expand and see full details.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.bodyMd:
Send a message and we’ll figure out the next step.

- Fast reply
- No pressure
- Clear plan

services.title: Consultation
services.shortMd: A short session to define your goal and next steps.
services.fullMd:
## Consultation

We talk, we clarify, we set a plan.

**Includes:**
- goal definition
- action steps
- follow-up notes

services.title: Coaching Session
services.shortMd: Deep work on one topic with concrete outcomes.
services.fullMd:
## Coaching Session

Longer session with structure.

- identify blocks
- choose tools
- leave with actions

services.title: Package (4 sessions)
services.shortMd: Best value if you want progress you can feel.
services.fullMd:
## Package (4 sessions)

Designed for momentum.

**You get:**
- weekly sessions
- homework
- progress tracking
